AI_Types.description: Large Language Models (LLMs) provide advanced conversational AI capabilities, including text generation, summarization, and complex reasoning.
Large language models for natural language understanding and generation.
Models that process and generate multiple modalities including text, images, and videos.
Models that generate images from textual descriptions.
Models that convert spoken language into text and synthesize speech.
Models that transform high-dimensional data into low-dimensional semantic vectors.
Models specialized in generating code from natural language prompts.
Models designed to execute multi‐step tasks with integrated tool usage.
Tools that provide internet search and data retrieval functionalities.
Large Language Models capable of understanding and generating human-like text for chat and reasoning applications.
Large Language Models for natural language processing, offering online inference, batch inference, and fine-tuning with token‐based pricing.
Models that integrate text with other modalities such as images and videos, enabling visual understanding and video generation.
Models that generate images from textual prompts.
Models that convert text into synthesized speech, including capabilities like voice cloning.
Models that convert text or images into vector representations for search, similarity, and other applications.
Models capable of processing and generating multiple types of data such as text, images, audio, and video.
Large Language Models primarily designed for text-based tasks.
Models that generate images from textual descriptions.
Models that convert text into numerical vectors for semantic understanding.
Large Language Models that process text-based input and generate text-based output.
Models that accept multiple input types including text and images, and generate text-based output.
Generative models that support both text and image processing, offering features like chat completion, image understanding, tool integration, and automatic context caching.
Large Language Models for generating and understanding text.
Converts spoken language into written text.
Generates natural-sounding speech from text.
Creates images based on textual descriptions.
Converts text into numerical vector representations for semantic analysis.
Interactive agents that assist with tasks and data analysis.
Tools to search and retrieve information from files and data.
Large Language Models for text generation and inference tasks.
Models that generate images from textual descriptions.
Converts text into natural-sounding speech.
Converts spoken language into text.
Large language models available on Baidu Cloud, including Baidu's Wenxin series and third‐party models with token‐based billing and online API experience.
Models that generate images from text prompts with pricing based on processing time or image dimensions.
Vector models for embedding and similarity search via API.
Re-ranking models for optimizing search result order.
Plugin services that integrate with AI models, such as a reading assistant plugin that charges per call with additional token-based fees.
